commentList.content: The location was perfect - close to the city centre and attractions. The hotel had great facilities and was very convenient.

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的賓客，您好，感謝您的入住與點評，我們將再接再厲，竭誠為您提供優質服務，我們小院能停車，周邊交通便利，距離北京朝陽高鐵站不足兩公里，步行時間大約20分鐘，酒店設定了免費洗衣房，送餐機器人，免費閲讀區和茶水區，為您的出行提供物超所值的服務。
feedbackList.translateContent: Dear guest, thank you for your stay and review. We will continue our efforts and wholeheartedly provide you with high-quality services. Parking is available in our courtyard and the surrounding transportation is convenient. It is less than two kilometers away from Beijing Chaoyang High-speed Railway Station and takes about 20 minutes to walk. The hotel has set up a free laundry room, food delivery robot, free reading area and tea area to provide value-for-money services for your travel.

commentList.content: I had a fantastic stay at this hotel. The service was impeccable, the room was clean and comfortable, and the location was ideal. I highly recommend it for a wonderful experience.

commentList.content: Fantastic hotel, great price for what they offer. It’s clean, new and has all basic amenities and a great shower.

commentList.content: Very helpful staff. Nice hotel. Thank you Hanting!

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的賓客您好：感謝您對我們的誇獎可信任，能夠認識您也非常高興，是您的鼓勵給了我們很大自信，酒店距離婦產醫院距離很近，聯繫您可以打車過去，婦產醫院周邊停車不是很方便，酒店有免費停車場，期待您下次來北京時過來入住哦
feedbackList.translateContent:
Hello, dear guests:
Thank you for your trustworthy compliments to us. I am also very happy to know you. Your encouragement has given us great confidence. The hotel is very close to the Maternity Hospital. If you contact us, you can take a taxi there. Parking around the Maternity Hospital is not very convenient. The hotel has a free parking lot. I look forward to your next visit to Beijing
live

commentList.content: Very good hotel. Stayed 3 days, it was so confortable and nice people at reception area.  Only issue was to walk from/to metro station. It takes 20 mins.

commentList.content: The hotel was nice. Clean is not enough. Some workers cant speak english.

Nice hotel close to the railway! 

Hotel allowed me to check in early which was really appreciated. 

Comfy room with a nice sized bed. Would recommend this room if traveling from Chaoyang Railway Station

feedbackList.content: Thank you for your praise and affirmation. Meeting in this vast sea of people is fate. May our fate last forever, and we look forward to your visit again!

commentList.content:
It was in almost all ways an average stay for a transfer. No luxury (no wardrobe, small room, view of backyards) but also no discomforts. The location in CHAOYANG district is not bad, the high speed railway station can be reached within 30 min (on foot) or by car less than 10 min.

What surprised me was that the sink was in the room/ hallway instead of the bathroom.

commentList.content: Front desk services are excellent. Room cleaning is excellent. The rooms are not smelly like other hotels, and the option of no inside room carpets is perfect. Keep up. Hope to visit and recommend you to my friends. Great. Room food delivery with the robot is excellent. Customer was satisfied.

commentList.content:
Absolutely stunning hotel for the price: the location is fantastic. 
The rooms were very clean. The staff were very helpful.
